title: General Ledger Specialist
job_description:
Review accounting entries related to expenses, revenue, and bank transactions from internal teams.
Record payroll transactions, create and manage fixed assets, process depreciation, and allocate costs accurately.
Perform monthly reconciliation of fixed assets, comparing recorded purchases with actual inventory
Review and verify accrual entries to ensure proper expense recognition.
Prepare and submit tax declarations and related reports as required; liaise with relevant parties to clarify any discrepancies.
Reconcile intercompany accounts and ensure timely settlement of internal balances.
Conduct periodic inventory checks and fixed asset verifications upon request.
Perform other tasks and special projects assigned by management
requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in accounting, Finance, or a related field.
Proven experience in general ledger accounting or a similar role in retail/ supply chain
Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial reporting, and tax regulations.
Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office, especially Excel.
Excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and a high level of accuracy.
Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Good communication and problem-solving skills.
Can communicate in English
